title: Activists file lawsuit against Meta over murdered Ethiopian professor
description: The lawsuit against Facebook parent company Meta alleges the social media giant is fueling violence and hate across Eastern and Southern Africa.

title: Utah bans TikTok from public devices, joining other Republican states
description: It's the latest to say it does not trust the Chinese-owned company with data. TikTok says policies are enacted based on "unfounded, politically charged falsehoods."

title: U.S. charges FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried with criminal fraud
description: The SEC and CFTC also hit the disgraced crypto CEO with civil lawsuits.

title: Your phone is terrible at phone calls. Here’s how to fix it.
description: Streaming YouTube on the bus? You're golden. But audio call quality on our smartphones is worse than it was in the landline era.

title: Monkey deaths at Musk’s brain-implant firm stir calls for FDA bans
description: A medical ethics group asked the FDA to disqualify Neuralink from animal tests and submitting data from those procedures in applications for device approvals.

title: Live updates: SEC accuses Sam Bankman-Fried of defrauding investors
Hong Kong demands Google bury protest song in online anthem search results
description: Hong Kong authorities remain very sensitive about "Glory to Hong Kong" despite the city's reputation for openness and access to information in contrast to the mainland.
